welcome_message_title: Welcome to Harrow on the Hill
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Harrow on the Hill, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its beautiful hilltop views and historic landmarks. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this lovely city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee applies.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, offering a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet travelers, providing exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Biggin Hill Airport offers luxurious amenities for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a luxurious and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers, providing exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The larger of the two terminals at Gatwick Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller of the two terminals at Gatwick Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Limited free access, premium options available for purchase.
